name: Elektrobock
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the skill you can control TS11WiFi, TS11WiFi Therm and TS11WiFi Profi devices. You will be able to switch the device connected to the socket on and off.

Users must bind this skill to their elektrobock account they created in EOB WiFi app. This step will have to be done only once. In order to be able to discover and control devices with this skill, the device must be online and configured to communicate with elektrobock server. Devices can be configured using EOB WiFi app.
